data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Describe your favorite thing to do on rainy days. What makes this activity ideal for a rainy day? Why do you enjoy this activity?
data.answer: I like watching movies on rainy days the most because it is the best time to turn family room into our personal theatre, find a movie the whole family will like, and settle in with a blanket and coffee table full of snacks. Watching movies with family is ideal for a rainy day because everyone is cooped up inside and relaxed. Besides, some films are very entertaining and provoking, which makes it a fun project that can bring us even closer together. （82 字）
